snippet: The American Conservative Union is quietly working with business lobbyists to tame the activists pushing Congress to adopt some of the most austere spending limits in decades.
abstract: American Conservative Union, one of country's largest and oldest conservative advocacy groups, is quietly working with business lobbyists to tame activists who have pushed Republican lawmakers to adopt austere spending limits; will focus on blocking cuts to federal military and infrastructure spending.
lead_paragraph: The American Conservative Union is quietly working with business lobbyists to tame the activists pushing Congress to adopt some of the most austere spending limits in decades.

headline.seo: American Conservative Union Fighting Spending Cuts
headline.main: Lobbyists Fighting Spending Cuts Find Ally in Group That Often Backs Them
headline.print_headline: Lobbyists Fighting Spending Cuts Find Ally in Group That Often Backs Them
